name: Corridor (REEE2752)
description:
See what you did? You caused all this mayhem. You can't avoid the mayhem now, can you anymore. It's only a matter of time before they get you. Until then, I'll be watching. Waiting. I'll be there every moment until your demise. You provoked us. Now there's no putting us back.

This game was inspired by P. T. It is my first game made with unity, and it isn't that good. There's not much plot, but since it's a prequel, I guess, I may remake it. It's part of a series i'm calling "The Lonesome Ones" Quadrilogy.
